ModMetaData.name: Hauts' Offbeat Psycasts
ModMetaData.author: Hautarche
ModMetaData.description:
Provides 36 new psycasts, six for each level of psycasting. It's roughly an even split between "combat" and "utility" psycasts, though some utility casts can be used cleverly in combat.
To make it easier to get specific psycasts, the mod options let you increase the number of psytrainers that exotic traders sell, or increase the number of psycasts learned at each level.
If you are also using Cooler Psycasts, adds 6 new transcendent (level 7-10) psycasts as well.
Also buffs the Flashstorm psycast (can be disabled in mod options).
See the full descriptions here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1p9qs5bZcG81I1lDf-MkCGc3xYOvKKLKvJ9PBct6y7xg/edit?usp=sharing
